          <title>

          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Križanka sestavljena iz besed povezanih z podnebjem v Afriki.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword puzzle build of terms related to the climate in Africa.</string>

          </description>

          </description>
